data.message:
EUZUBILLAHIMINEŞŞEYTANIRRACIM
BISMILLAHIRRAHMANIRRAHIM

ALLAHU EKBERRRRR! LA İLAHE İLLALLAH MUHAMMEDEN RESULULLAH!..@@.!!!!!!

I did the obligatory prayers five times
a day to the nation. And I promised myself that, who (beside me) taking care
not to make the five daily prayers comes ahead of time, I'll put it to heaven.
Who says prayer does not show attention to me I do not have a word for it.!
Prophet Muhammad (s.a.v.)
hell if you did until the needle tip could not
remove your head from prostration Prophet Muhammad pbuh
